desc: A comprehensive reference for an executable UML and the advantages of modeling This book presents the most up-to-date technology for rapidly developing information systems using the object-oriented paradigm and models, and establishes an executable profile of UML for such model-driven development. As a software developer, architect, or analyst, youâ€™ll benefit from learning how information systems can be developed more efficiently using the object-oriented paradigm and model-driven approach.
title: Model-Driven Development with Executable UML
